items.storedescription:
5.5" XPEL Branded Silicone Squeegee: This squeegee measures 5.5" x 3" and is the ideal size for larger areas of film application.

High-Quality Silicone Material: Made with high-quality silicone material, these squeegees are durable, flexible, and resistant to heat, chemicals, and abrasion. 

Double-Tapered Spade Edge: The double-tapered spade edge design allows for precise and efficient application of automotive film, ensuring a smooth and bubble-free finish. 

Comfortable Grip: The squeegee's ergonomic handle design provides a comfortable grip, reducing hand fatigue and allowing for extended use. 

Our XPEL-branded silicone squeegees are the perfect tool to help you achieve a precise application during paint protection film installation. Order yours today and experience the difference in quality and efficiency!

items.storedescription: Tri-Edge Blue is a new tool in the industry with the latest technology that helps apply window film with ease. Its patented design high quality material makes this tool one of a kind. Its precision angles and comfort grip will allow the user to reach those challenging areas to achieve perfection. This tool has been analyzed and closely inspected to ensure that the finish is smooth, no more rough edges.

Tri-Edge Yellow is our next level tool. We have turned up the strength on the already great design. For those installers that prefer a slightly harder material, Tri-Edge Yellow will be sure to meet your needs.

Tri-Edge Orange is our most rigid tool yet. Look no further for the perfect tool to finish the job. Offering both strength and support, the Tri-Edge Orange has strong edges that will finish off those hard to smooth creases.

The perfect design of the Tri-Edge Plus just got better.  The tool is now 10% larger than the regular Tri-Edge, there are finger grips on both sides and the rubber squeegee edge has been upgraded!   The rubberized blade was carefully designed to create a dry line on the glass at the bottom of the film. The design team has found the solution to help prevent dusty water from returning to any open bubbles.

The angles of the original Tri-Edge have been recalculated and extended into a bigger tool. With the same durability and quality of the original Tri-Edge but gives you the ability to reach easier into deep gaskets and hard to reach spots.   Blue: First level, softest material Yellow: Second level, stronger than the blue Orange: Third level, hardest material Pink: Rubberized, heat resistant, and best used on wet surfaces.

Tri-Edge Reach Windshield Tint Squeegee Tool This is by far our biggest and most ambitious tool yet! This tool is designed to effectively squeegee water from the most difficult places to reach. This tool is 16 3/4 inches in length and built with a double rubber blade on each side. THE REACH allows you to squeegee water from the bottom of the back window or windshield with ease. 
THE REACH is made with a special formulated plastic and rubber in order to achieve the necessary stiffness and durability of its four edges. One side of the tool provides an excellent grip while the other side uses both edges to squeegee the water out; one pushes the water and the other drags the water. This tool is completely adaptable with two different radius's of curvature at each side; in other words, one side is stiffer than the other.

Frustrated when a tool scratches the film and you need to redo a window. Tri-Edge has created just the tool for the job, The SMOOTH-IT which was designed to effectively and evenly smooth out the edge on film installation tools (bondos, speed wings, contours, teflon cards, hard cards, easy reaches, blades and Tri-Edges just to name a few. It’s easy and inexpensive to use. Gentle sliding of the tool thru the channel back and forth applying an even but SOFT pressure against the mat. Excessive force and speed against the mat will create high heat due to friction which can MELT the edge of the tool. It’s recommend to use the SMOOTH-IT on your tools at least once a day. You will save time, material, and your tools will last longer. Mat replacement kits are available in two textures: Grey A107-3G: Fine mat, ideal for removing small or lite scratches of the tool. Black A107-3B: Medium mat that works best and faster on big or deep scratch.
Black A107-3B: Medium mat that works best and faster on big or deep scratch. THIS IS REPLACEMENT MAT'S ONLY, THE WHOLE SMOOTH IT TOOL IS AVAILABLE ON SKU#'S A107-1 OR A107-2
Grey A107-3G: Fine mat, ideal for removing small or light scratches of the tool.  ***THIS IS REPLACEMENT MAT'S ONLY, THE WHOLE SMOOTH IT TOOL IS AVAILABLE ON SKU#'S A107-1 OR A107-2***

The Unger Pro Handle is designed for use with Unger metal channels; which then can be fitted with either Pro Replacement Blades for cleaning or Blue Max Inserts for film installation. The Blue Max, Orange Crush, Clear Crush, Pink Clean, Yellow Flat Out, and Red Line squeegee blades can also be used in the Unger Pro Handle.

The 8" Fusion Big Mouth Handle is a must have for the installer that doesn’t want to mess around. Put two hands on the extended 14 1/2'' handle grips and don’t let any solution sneak past your blade with the Fusion Big Mouth Stretch Handle and Fusion Red Line Extractor 3/8'' thick squeegee blades (sold separately). This combo makes your productivity unstoppable!

The Unger ErgoTec Handle is designed for use with Unger metal channels; which then can be fitted with either Pro Replacement Blades for cleaning or Blue Max Inserts for film installation. The Blue Max, Orange Crush, Clear Crush, Pink Clean, Yellow Flat Out, and Red Line squeegee blades can also be used in the Unger ErgoTech Handle.

he 5" Fusion Squeegee Handle is designed to easily accommodate squeegee blades such as the Orange Crush, Blue Max, and Clear Max blades. Are you tired of bending, squeezing and forcing Blue Max blades into your Unger handles? Try out a 5" Fusion handle today.

The Fusion Handle 8" holds larger squeegee blades and provides a larger surface area than the 5" Fusion Handle and 5" blade; allowing you to push more water out with each stroke. The larger surface area allows you to finish your flat glass jobs quicker and with less effort. Designed to hold the 8" Blue Max Blades.  Made In The USA

This “Handy” blade grip is rightfully named Fusion Hand Job  and is the newest squeegee handle in the Fusion family. We are happy to announce that this handle is made with injection molded glass filled nylon and features a removable ”jaw”. The unique rounded palm grip is designed to fit perfectly in any hand. This handle takes the 5" X 2" Orange Crushes, Clear Crushes, Pink Clean, Blue Max, or Yellow Flat Out blades.

The 5" Fusion Stretch are one of our longest handles yet featuring a 14 ½” metal extension handle with two comfortable textured rubber grip sections. These handles are ideal for installing films on flat glass and security film. This handle holds the 5"x 2" Orange Crush blades, Blue Max blades, Clear Crush, and the Yellow Flat Out blades.

The 8" Fusion Stretch is one of our longest handles yet featuring a 14 ½” metal extension handle with two comfortable textured rubber grip sections. These handles are ideal for installing films on flat glass and security film. This handle holds the 8" Orange Crush, 8" Blue Max, and the 8" Yellow Flat Out.

The Performax Handle is a heavy duty squeegee handle that is designed to easily utilize thicker squeegee blades such as Blue Max, Clear Max and Orange Fusion. The end of the handle is threaded so that extensions can be screwed in for safety film installation requiring two hands. Made In The USA

The Fusion Handle 5'' Shorty is a squeegee handle is brought to you by popular demand! The thumb stop has been removed and an all new handle has been created for you. This compact handle is ideal for automotive window tinting and paint protection ?lm installs. The Fusion Handle 5'' Shorty is designed to easily accommodate squeegee blades such as the Orange Crush, Blue Max, and Clear Max blades.

The 5" Short Fusion Squeegee Handle is made just a little shorter than the A1400F5 to better fit into the auto tinter's hand. These Fusion handles are designed to easily accommodate squeegee blades such as the Orange Crush, Blue Max, and Clear Crush blades.

The Equalizer Handle is designed to allow extra leverage and to save your hands from getting as tired when using the Equalizer Push Stick. The Equalizer Handle will not work with other brands of push sticks.

6" Pro Blade with metal channel for window cleaning is built to last. Great for initial prep work or slip the black blade out and put a 6" Blue Max Insert in and your ready to install window film; even the thickest safety films.
10" Pro Blade with metal channel for window cleaning is built to last. Great for initial prep work or slip the black blade out and put a 10" Blue Max blade in and your ready to install!
12" Pro Blade with metal channel for window cleaning is built to last.
18" Pro Blade with metal channel

This setup includes an Unger Handle and a Cropped Blue Max Blade pre-installed for ease of use. Buy a Blue Max today! Please note this is a made in the USA product. Bluemax emphasizes that between batches, and even in the same batch that the blue dye process can vary greatly. Dye is also not UV stable and can become lighter in direct sunlight. Color may vary from deep blue to vibrant blue. NOTE ALSO that on blades with bevel or cropped cut. These blades are dye cut on a machine and part of that machine process locks the blade into a channel. Depending on a number of circumstances the machine process will leave an imprint on the side surfaces only. All cut edges will be smooth. Note that the machine squeezes the blades through and depending on heat and other variables after the process is completed you may see a deep cross hatched impression, a very faint one or none at all. This is all NORMAL and will not affect durometer or performance.
items.storedisplayname2: Performax Handle with Cropped Blue Max Blade

items.storedescription: The Grey 5-Way Tool is a cheap, but great window film trim guide. It is also a handy "Bump Tool"  for bumping or drying the edges of your flat glass film. The Grey 5 Way is thicker and more flexible than either the white or the black 5-way Tools. MADE IN THE USA

The Black 5-Way Tool is great as a trim guide or wrap it in a paper towel to use it as a "bump tool" to get water out. Much harder than the cheaper white 5 way tool, so it seems to last longer. MADE IN THEUSA

The ProToolsNow Go Doctor Blue window film squeegee features an "i-beam" handle construction which fits comfortably in your hand. This design provides greater efficiency and less fatigue. The Blue Go Doctor blade is the firmest of the Go Doctor blades. Made In The USA

The ProToolsNow Go Doctor Red window film squeegee features an "i-beam" handle construction which fits comfortably in your hand. This design provides greater efficiency and less fatigue. The Red Go Doctor blade is the softest of the Go Doctor blades. Made In The USA

An ergonomic hand-grip with high-performance, interchangeable blades for tint, wrap, and PPF installations. Features machine milled .24" edge tip blades. Use either the firm yellow 90 or softer orange 85 blade.

An ergonomic hand-grip with high-performance, interchangeable blades for tint, wrap, and PPF installations. Features machine milled .24" edge tip blades. Use either the firm yellow 90 or softer orange 85 blade.

The Fusion PPF Hybrid Paddle Squeegee is available in 4 sizes. It is available in a touch up version of 1/2” wide, and paddle versions of 2”, 4”, and 6” lengths. The PPF Hybrid features two sided squeegee surfaces. A Blue side (94 durometer) and an Orange side (85 durometer); which allow PPF Installers to easily switch between the desired working blade with the flip of the tool. The PPF Hybrid is an innovation carried over from our Fusion Hybrid Dual Durometer Squeegee Blade. Originally designed for window films, the new PPF version has been modified to fit in-hand as a paddle squeegee for Paint Protection Films with a durable hard coating.

The Fusion PPF Hybrid Paddle Squeegee is available in 4 sizes. It is available in a touch up version of 1/2” wide, and paddle versions of 2”, 4”, and 6” lengths. The PPF Hybrid features two sided squeegee surfaces. A Blue side (94 durometer) and an Orange side (85 durometer); which allow PPF Installers to easily switch between the desired working blade with the flip of the tool. The PPF Hybrid is an innovation carried over from our Fusion Hybrid Dual Durometer Squeegee Blade. Originally designed for window films, the new PPF version has been modified to fit in-hand as a paddle squeegee for Paint Protection Films with a durable hard coating.
items.storedisplayname2: Fusion PPF Hybrid 4" Detail Paddle Squeegee

items.storedescription: The Fusion PPF Hornet Detail Paddle Squeegee is an industry first! We are happy to bring PPF innovation available in 4 sizes which can be purchased individually or as pack. It is available in a touch up version of 1/2” wide, and paddle versions of 2”, 4”, and 6” lengths. The PPF Hornet features two soft sides, Black (80 Durometer) and Yellow (70 Durometer) squeegee surfaces allow PPF Installers to easily switch between the desired working blade with the flip of the tool. The inner red “core” of the tool allows users to have the rigid backbone the soft working surfaces need to push and pull liquid from their jobs. We recommend the PPF Hornet for Paint Protection Films with soft or “self healing” hard coatings. We also offer a stiffer version called the PPF Hybrid (A1993).
items.storedisplayname2: Fusion PPF Hornet 0.5" Detail Paddle Squeegee

The Side Swiper has consistently been one of our top tools. A super stiff tool for automotive tint installation. The Side Swiper is great for hard to reach back window installations.The Side Swiper is sold with or without the 6" Blue Max Blade.

The Side Swiper Complete has consistently been one of our top tools. A super stiff tool for automotive tint installation. The Side Swiper Complete is great for hard to reach back window installations. The Side Swiper Complete is sold with or without the 6" Blue Max Insert Blade (B195-6).

The Conquistador will allow you to throw away your conquerors! Great technology gives us this superior Conquistador. New stiffer body and featured in a high visibility color so you won’t leave your favorite tool in a car. 6.5” rubber edge is molded to the body (not glued) and will not peel away. A true must have for any serious tinter. New, lower price!! MADE IN THE USA
The ProToolsNow Yellow Tail Fin is great tool for getting behind hard to reach 3rd brake lights. Negative curve to keep constant pressure on the film. Made In The USA
